description: Wearing the dress or carrying any token used by a soldier, sailor or airman with intent that it may be believed that he is such a soldier, sailor or airman
Receiving property taken by war or depredation mentioned in sections 125 And 126
Public servant voluntarily allowing prisoner of State or war in his custody to escape
Punishment: Imprisonment for Life or 10 Years + Fine

description: Public servant negligently suffering prisoner of State or war in his custody to escape
Aiding escape of, rescuing or harbouring, such prisoner, or offering Any resistance to the recapture of such prisoner
Punishment: Imprisonment for Life or 10 Years + Fine

description: Abetting mutiny, or attempting to seduce an officer, soldier sailor or airman from his allegiance or duty
Punishment: Imprisonment for Life or 10 Years + Fine

description: Abetment of mutiny, if mutiny is committed in consequence thereof
Punishment: Death or Imprisonment for Life or 10 Years + Fine

description: Abetment of an assault by An officer, soldier, sailor Or airman on his superior officer, when in the execution of his office
Abetment of such assault, if the assault is committed
